summary: This mod brings Cam the Altmer thief to Skyrim, you can find him hanging out at the Ragged Flagon in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Cam the Altmer Thief Follower
[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This adds Cam, an Altmer thief  to the Ragged Flagon in Riften. He comes equipped with uniquely enchanted thieves guild armor (based off of Karliah's armor) and weapons (based on Mercer Frey's fighting style).[/size][/color]
[/font]
[i][size=4]1.2 UPDATE Cam is now completely standalone (aside from the requisite DLC), and the files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! [/size][/i][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]

[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/color][/font][/size]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Housecarl for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Steward for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique Voice (MaleSoldier/Gideon Emery)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique weapons & armor with enchantments[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to [/size][/color][/font]
[list]

[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]Apachii[/url]﻿ for ApachiiSky Hair[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]CD Projekt for The Witcher 3[/size][/color][/font]

[/size][/color][/font][/list][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Recommended Mods

author: AedanStarfang
